# üé• Shoutout Player for Streamer.bot

A custom **Shoutout Player** integration for [Streamer.bot](https://streamer.bot/) that automatically plays a Twitch clip when you run the `!so` (shoutout) command in chat.  
This makes shoutouts more fun and engaging by showcasing a clip from the streamer you‚Äôre shouting out.

---

## ‚úÖ Requirements

- **Twitch Client ID & Twitch Access Token**  
  üëâ [Get them here](https://twitchtokengenerator.com/)  
- **[Streamer.bot 0.2.8+](https://streamer.bot/)**  
- **[OBS Studio](https://obsproject.com/)**  

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation

### 1. Import Code to Streamer.bot

Copy the following code and import it into **Streamer.bot**:
```

```

---

### 2. Setup in Streamer.bot

1. After importing, go to **`Alerts`** and select **`New Shoutout (Import)`**  
2. Replace `ENTER HERE` with your **Twitch Client ID** and **Twitch Access Token**  

---

### 3. Setup in OBS

1. Create a **Group** in OBS called `Shoutout_Group`  
2. Inside that group, create a **Browser Source** called `Shoutout_Player2`  
3. Make sure `Shoutout_Player2` is inside the `Shoutout_Group`  

---

### 4. Test

- Run the `!so` command in chat  
- A clip from the shouted-out streamer should play in OBS üéâ  

---

This project is open source and free to use. Modify as needed for your stream setup.
